item.title: The observer
item.description: It was then that I realized that even though we frequented the same venues and did similar things, our experiences could not be further apart. Photo by Tengyart on Unsplash I can’t tell exactly when this happened or what triggered it; it could have been a suprising text from a friend, unexpected news or casual socialization. There has been so many similar incidences where my assumptions about the world were challenged.
